column4: Okay, I'm going to attempt to install my nvidia drivers.  But I need to know how to get out of x and then back into it first
Anyone know the commands to jump from different runlevels off the top of their heads?

ctrl+alt+backspace will kill X, and then probably restart it, if you want it to stay stopped you'll want to do: /etc/init.d/gdm stop, to start it back up when you're done installing the driver, do: /etc/init.d/gdm start
Thanks man.  I thought there was something more than ctrl+alt+backspace
